title: The best of Larry Niven
creator: Niven, Larry
Strahan, Jonathan
description: Becalmed in Hell -- Bordered in black -- Neutron star -- The soft weapon -- All the myriad ways -- Not long before the end -- Man of steel, woman of Kleenex -- Inconstant moon -- Rammer -- Cloak of anarchy -- The fourth profession -- Flash crowd -- The defenseless dead -- The flight of the horse -- The hole man -- Night on Mispec Moor -- Flatlander -- The magic goes away -- Cautionary tales -- Limits -- A teardrop falls -- The return of William Proxmire -- The borderland of Sol -- Smut talk -- The missing mass
Presents a collection of twenty-seven short science fiction stories that were written over a period of thirty-five years, including "Neutron Star," "The Magic Goes Away," and "The Borderland of Sol."
subject: Science fiction, American
Short stories, American
